channel.title: Latest News
channel.description: Latest News (Press Releases) - Read news before it's news

item.title: marketgoo Announces Partnership With cdmon
item.description: **Meta Description:** cdmon has partnered with marketgoo to provide SEO tools for improved website traffic and rankings. cdmon customers now get easy-to-use SEO audits, keyword tracking, and more. No SEO experience needed.

item.title: C.M. James Unveils Riveting AI Novella: 'Stan: The Artificial Intelligence Man
item.description: Journey into a Reversal World Where AI Beings Mirror Humanity in C.M. James' 'Stan: The Artificial Intelligence Man'. This Story Mirrors that of the Human Invention of AI but in an alternate world where AI reigns supreme and humans are nonexistent.

item.title: ASA Announces Liza D. Bowersox, ASA, as 2024-2025 BV Discipline Committee Member-At-L
item.description: ASA proudly announces the election of Liza D. Bowersox, ASA, as a Committee Member-At-Large of ASA's BV Discipline Committee for the 2024-2025 term. Liza D.

item.title: ASA Announces Todd S. Larson, ASA, as 2024-2025 BV Discipline Committee Member-At-Lar
item.description: ASA proudly announces the election of Todd S. Larson, ASA, as ASA's BV Discipline Committee Member-At-Large for the 2024-2025 term. Todd S. Larson, ASA, has been a dedicated member of ASA since 1998.

item.title: ASA Announces Dan Daitchman, ASA, as 2024-2025 BV Discipline Committee Member-At-Large
item.description: ASA proudly announces the election of Dan Daitchman, ASA, as the ASA's Business Valuation Discipline Committee Member-At-Large for the 2024-2025 term. Dan has been a member of ASA since 2012.

item.title: ASA Announces Melanie Modica, ASA, ARM, as 2024-2025 ARM Vice Chair
item.description: ASA proudly announces the election of Melanie Modica, ASA, ARM, as ASA's ARM Vice Chair for the 2024-2025 term.

item.title: The Language Digitisation Debate: Big Tech vs Indigenous Communities
item.description: Advocates for indigenous language communities want to see their languages thrive online without relinquishing sovereignty of their language data to Big Tech.

item.title: Pandora's Box: Groundbreaking Achievement in Contemporary Classical Music
item.description: On June 23, 2024, the third and final installment for the highly anticipated AR version of "Pandora's Box "took place at the infamous Greenery Studios in Los Angeles, California.

item.title: Cobb County Democratic Committee Chair Essence Johnson Statement On The 2024 Presidential Debate
item.description: It has been eight years since the 2016 Presidential Election. In that time Donald Trump's exaggerated lies and hateful rhetoric have changed little except now he is a convicted felon presidential candidate.

item.title: This Summer, Get to the Core of Your Pursuits: A New Reality Show Ignites the Passion Within
item.description: Prepare to be inspired by a new breed of reality TV. This summer, UVO Media Productions unveils Getting to the Core, a groundbreaking series that dives deep into the lives of purpose-driven entrepreneurs.
